name: プロデューサー
text: お、このアイドル、最近よくテレビで見るよな
trans: Oh, that idol's been on TV a lot recently.

name: 結華
text:
そうだね、でも活動自体は意外と長いんだよ？
三峰も前から応援してるんだー
trans: I know right! She's actually been on the scene for quite a while, though? Mitsumine's been cheering her since before she got big.

name: 結華
text:
トークも上手いし、いろんな仕事こなせちゃうし
やっぱり経験値が違うって感じ
trans: She's a talented speaker. and done a lot of other kinds of work to boot. She's racked up a lot of experience.

name: プロデューサー
text: そんなことまで知ってるなんて……
trans: If you know that much, then...

text: でも俺の方が詳しいな
trans:
I bet I know
more about her
than you do.

She's one of 
your rivals now.

I see you've
done a lot of
research.

name: 結華
text:
お、プロデューサー、いいねその自信
もしかして勝負がご所望かな？
trans:
Woah, I like that confidence, Producer.
Perhaps you'd like to settle this with a trivia battle?

name: 結華
text: この子についてどっちが詳しいか、決めちゃう？
trans: Is it time for us to determine who knows more about this idol, once and for all?

name: 結華
text: なるほど。……今はたしかにそうかもね
trans: Oh, yeah... Since I'm an idol now, I guess that's true.

name: 結華
text:
でもアイドルになりたての三峰じゃ、
まだまだ差は大きいと思うよ
trans: Though, a veteran like her and a newbie like Mitsumine are on totally different playing fields.

name: 結華
text:
ざぁんねん、調べてるんじゃないよー
好きだから情報が集まるだけ
trans: You've got it all wrong, I don't know that stuff that because of "research"! It's because I like her.

name: 結華
text:
これがファンってものだよ
覚えといてね、プロデューサー
trans:
It's an important part of being idol's fan.
Make sure you remember that, Producer.

name: プロデューサー
text: （うっ……しまった。別のことを言えば良かったな……）
trans: (Uh-oh... I screwed up. I should have said something else...)
